1486160.name: Visitations Issue One: Foundation
1486160.description:
By supporting further development of this project, you will receive additional scenes and features.

12 Unique Scenes - Generated or controlled procedurally.

Clinically Proven - Visitations has been included in clinical testing. Patients undergoing infusions for pain and depression prefer the experience with Visitations.

Gamification - Turn on game mode for any scene.

Customization - Curate your own meditative experiences by choosing combinations of scenes with voice over meditation or music on a timer.

Select - Choose which scene you want to jump to at any point and stay there indefinitely.
1486160.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
